description.value:
The Fiend lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFireBolt00]{Fire Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResistance]{Resistance}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBurningHan]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommand000]{Command}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.mycojDbHOZg2luJc]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.RSKqQMpJzJEkJi2G]{Scorching Ray}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFireball00]{Fireball}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplStinkingCl]{Stinking Cloud}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFireShield]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWallOfFire]{Wall of Fire}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFlameStrik]{Flame Strike}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHallow0000]{Hallow}
description.chat:
The Fiend lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell LevelSpells
cantripfire bolt, resistance
1stburning hands, command
2ndblindness/deafness, scorching ray
3rdfireball, stinking cloud
4thfire shield, wall of fire
5thflame strike, hallow
